Text: FW Goodwill Allocation Memorandum Cc See message below I have also included Appendix A referenced in the memorandum that includes the summary of goodwill as of June Original Message From Farmer Stanley Sent Friday September PM To Causey Richard Colwell Wes Butts Bob Faldyn Rodney Cc Morrison Mike Subject Goodwill Allocation Memorandum Everyone Attached below is the memorandum we are preparing to document Enrons position on assignment of goodwill to reporting units pursuant to the adoption of SFAS For the sake of expediency the appendicies referenced in the memorandum have not been included for review at this time Please review and provide your comments back to Mike Morrison or me by next Monday afternoon if possible We look forward to your input Thanks Stan

RE KCS Cc to make sure than the notional quantities will be equal to of the scheduled production for the VPP Original Message From Sherman Cris Sent Wednesday May PM To Farmer Stanley Subject FW KCS Original Message From Anderson Diane Sent Wednesday May PM To Bailey Derek Cook Mary Sherman Cris Eubank Marshall Bushman Teresa Cc Shackleton Sara Subject KCS Attached is the redline redraft for the KCS trades the terms will apply to both confirms Please acknowledge your issuesconsent to Sara Thanks Forwarded by Diane AndersonNAEnron on PM From Sara CT on PM To Diane nron cc Subject KCS File KCSEnergyMarketingRdoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax
